question: Propose several syntheses of *cis*-3-heptene, beginning with each of the following molecules. Note in each case whether your proposed route gives the desired compound as a major or minor final product. **(a)** 3-Chloroheptane; **(b)** 4-chloroheptane; **(c)** 3,4-dichloroheptane; **(d)** 3-heptanol; **(e)** 4-heptanol; **(f)** *trans*-3-heptene; **(g)** 3-heptyne.
